Load recruiting data

load_recruiting.Rd

Loads information about college basketball recruiting

Usage

load_recruiting()

Value

a dataframe of information about college basketball recruits

Examples

# \donttest{
load_recruiting()
#>           id source_id position school_id                   school
#>        <int>    <char>   <char>     <int>                   <char>
#>     1:     1  46134184       SF         1                Utah Prep
#>     2:     2  46118506       PF         2                 Columbus
#>     3:     3  46128125       CG         3            Prolific Prep
#>     4:     4  46137363       PF         4          Highland School
#>     5:     5  46136807        C         5             Link Academy
#>    ---                                                            
#> 10619: 13083     63814       PG      1264 Oldsmar Christian School
#> 10620: 13084     64296       SG       523           Warren Central
#> 10621: 13085     63782       SG      3633          St Joseph-Ogden
#> 10622: 13086     64221       PG      1956                   Dobson
#> 10623: 13087     64532       SG        63                   Hoover
#>        hometown_city hometown_state hometown_country hometown_latitude
#>               <char>         <char>           <char>             <num>
#>     1:     Hurricane             UT             <NA>          37.17503
